export_figma_variables_tailwind_css_or_c: Export Figma Variables as Tailwind CSS or CSS Variables
import_as_tailwind_css_presets: You can import it as Tailwind CSS Presets into your project, or directly copy the parts you need.
ignore_default_palette_description: This option will ignore Tailwind CSS default color palettes such as Slate, Gray, Zinc, Neutral... If you haven't modified them and are using the default values, you should ignore them.
when_do_you_need_to_do_this: When do you need to do this?
when_do_you_need_to_do_this_description: If your Figma Variables contain Tailwind CSS default color palettes and you haven't modified them, you should ignore them. Variables Xporter will only ignore Tailwind CSS default color palettes that start with color/ or colors/
tailwind_css_variable_naming_specificati: Your Figma Variables must follow Tailwind CSS naming conventions,
